channel.title: Real News Feed
channel.description: Aggregated real news items (8) â€” generated on request.

item.title: Brazil opens three weeks of COP30-linked climate events
item.description: Brazil has opened three weeks of events linked to the COP30 climate summit, aiming to showcase climate action and host international delegations.
item.author: Reuters

item.title: London stocks ease after recent rally; focus shifts to budget
item.description: London's stock market cooled after a recent run-up as attention turned to the upcoming UK budget and Bank of England commentary.
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Fast-charging battery firm Nyobolt raises $30 million for expansion
item.description: UK-based battery technology company Nyobolt secured funding to expand work on ultra-fast charging batteries that can charge to 80% in minutes in prototype tests.
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Early flu wave could lead to 'long and drawn-out' winter for NHS
item.description: NHS England warned of an early flu wave and urged eligible groups to take up vaccination to reduce pressure on health services this winter.
item.author: NHS England

item.title: Cambridge scheme proposes fewer but bigger council homes
item.description: Plans submitted in Cambridge would deliver a mix of council and private homes as part of a new development proposal.
item.author: Housing Digital

item.title: New coral gardens and hydrothermal vents found near South Sandwich Islands
item.description: An Ocean Census Flagship expedition found new coral gardens, hydrothermal vents and possible new species in the remote South Sandwich Islands region.
item.author: Schmidt Ocean Institute / GoSouth expedition

item.title: The Top Exhibitions To See In London: October 2025
item.description: Londonist's picks for the best exhibitions to see in London during October 2025, covering galleries and museum highlights.
item.author: Londonist

item.title: England beat Spain in Euro 2025 final (penalty shootout)
item.description: England triumphed over Spain in a dramatic penalty shootout to win Euro 2025, with the match ending 1-1 and England winning on penalties.
item.author: Reuters
